表单组件

弹框表单

查询表单

On this page

弹窗表单文档 ​

展开代码
vue
<el-button @click="editSome" type="primary" style="margin: 20px">新增一列</el-button>
<el-dialog v-model="state.visible" title="对话框标题" width="50%">
    <dialog-form
        :label-width="'100px'"
        :form-list="formList"
        :form-data="state.formData"
        :rules="state.rules"
        :loading="state.loading"
        @onSubmit="onSubmit"
        @onCancel="onCancel">
        <template v-slot:slotFormItem>
            <el-input clearable v-model="state.formData.names" placeholder="asd"></el-input>
        </template>
    </dialog-form>
</el-dialog>

<script lang="ts" setup name="index">
const state = reactive({
    loading: false,
	visible: false,
	rules: {
    user: [
      { required: true, message: '请输入姓名', trigger: 'blur' },
    ],
  },
	formData: {
		number: 50,
		sex: '男',
		region: ['中国'],
		value: 'ff',
		nameS: '',
	}
});
const formList = computed(() => {
	return [
		{ title: '用户', key: 'user', type: 'input', clearable: true, disabled: true },
    { clearable: true, title: '数量', key: 'number', type: 'number', min: 0, max: 100 },
    {
			clearable: true,
			title: '是否',
			key: 'yes',
			type: 'selectID',
      filterable:true,
      remote:true,
      remoteMethod:(res)=>{
        console.log(1111,res)
      },
			options: [
				{ value: '1', label: '是' },
				{ value: '2', label: '否' },
			],
			label: 'label',
			value: 'value',
		},
		{ clearable: true, title: '年份', key: 'year', type: 'year' },
		{ clearable: true, title: '日期', key: 'date', type: 'date',disabled:true },
		{ clearable: true, title: '时间', key: 'time', type: 'time', disabled: true },
		{ title: '名称',clearable:true, key: 'slotFormItem', type: 'slotFormItem' },
		{
			clearable: true,
			title: '性别',
			key: 'sex',
			isHideForm: false,
			type: 'radioNO',
      options: [
				{ value: '1', label: '男' },
				{ value: '2', label: '女' },
			],
			label: 'label',
			value: 'value',
		},
		{
			clearable: true,
			title: '地区',
			key: 'region',
			isHideForm: true,
			type: 'checkbox',
			options: [
				{ value: '1', label: '中国' },
				{ value: '2', label: '德国' },
			],
			label: 'label',
			value: 'value',
		},
		{ clearable: true, title: '数量', key: 'number', type: 'inputNumber', min: 0, max: 100 },
		{ clearable: true, title: '开关', key: 'switch', type: 'switch', inactiveText: '未选中', activeText: '选中' },
		{
			limit: 2,
			clearable: true,
			title: '图片',
			key: 'uploadImg',
			type: 'uploadImg',
			change: (file, files) => {
				console.log(file, files)
			},
		},
	]
});
const editSome = () => {
	state.visible = true
}
</script>

属性 ​

Props
属性名说明类型必填默认值
formData表单数据存储对象Objectfalse{}
formList表单项，具体配置参数看formListArraytrue[]
rules校验Arrayfalse[]
labelWidth表单label宽度Stringfalse100px
isFooterBtn是否有底部按钮Booleanfalsetrue
submitText确定按钮名称Stringfalse确 定
closeText关闭按钮名称Stringfalse取 消
span几列，24为已列Numberfalse24
loading按钮请求状态Booleanfalsefalse
size表单项大小Stringfalsedefault
FormList
属性名说明类型必填默认值
title表单项labelStringtrue-
titleShow表单项label是否显示，为true时显示Stringtruefalse
key表单项model，对应formData的keyStringtrue-
placeholder表单项placeholderStringfalse请填写{{title}}
type表单项type 如：'input','select','month','year', 'cascader','date', 'daterange','datetimerange','dateH', 'time','datetime','radio', 'checkbox','inputNumber','datePicker', 'slot'Stringtrue-
optionstype为select,radio有效Arrayfalse[]
labeltype为select,radio时有效，option labelStringfalse-
valuetype为select,radio时有效，option valueStringfalse-
width设置input宽度Stringfalse100%
clearable是否开启清除，默认开启Booleanfalsefalse
change@change回调事件Functionfalse
isHideForm是否显示当前表单项Booleanfalsefalse
activeTexttype为switch时有效Stringfalse-
inactiveTexttype为switch时有效,未选中文字Stringfalse-
mintype为inputNumber时有效Stringfalse-
maxtype为inputNumber时有效Stringfalse-
bordercheckbox 有效，显示边框Booleanfalsefalse
disableddisabled 默认关闭Booleanfalsefalse
limittype为uploadImg时有效，图片数量限制Stringfalse
multipletype为select时有效，多选Booleanfalsefalse
filterabletype为select时有效，过滤筛选Booleanfalsefalse
Events
属性名说明类型必填默认值
onCancel取消按钮Functionfalse-
onSubmit提交按钮Functionfalse-
Slot
属性名说明类型必填默认值
slot表单插槽，在FormList定义type,支持语法jsxStringfalse-
slotFormItem表单插槽,自定义内容Stringfalse-
Pager
Next page查询表单
